title: Did They Fix the Bug on Mauy Thai Lee Sin
body:
I was considering purchasing mauy thai lee sin but i heard that there was a delay when he w to someone then tried to throw q.  I was wondering if this had been fixed because the video i saw of it was from October 2014.  
thanks for the help

replies.body:
Hey INFINNATY,

We'll take a look and let you know if there's a delay!

UPDATE: I'm not a Lee Sin pro, but I didn't see any noticeable delay in the scenario you provided.
Thank you i was just confirming before i purchased it
